body_html: @nuchi This is great. The team is very much interested in making this work. I hope we get it sort out officially in a few weeks but no promises as anything can happen and it looks like vacation season is here. I will try you info and at a min, include it for people on the performance guide page as a short-term solution if I post some MKL stuff in a couple weeks. Your effort is really appreciated. I think I was close but I I did not use the rpath variable and I suspect that is why I ended up with a broken build. :-)

body: @nuchi   This is great.  The team is very much interested in making this work.  I hope we get it sort out officially in a few weeks but no promises as anything can happen and it looks like vacation season is here.  I will try you info and at a min, include it for people on the performance guide page as a short-term solution if I post some MKL stuff in a couple weeks.  Your effort is really appreciated.  I think I was close but I I did not use the rpath variable and I suspect that is why I ended up with a broken build.  :-)
